context.title: Implementation of Self-Evolutionary Layers (v2.5 to v3.3)

output.summary: Completed a rapid succession of development phases, implementing the core modules for the SSP's self-evolutionary capabilities. This includes the Impact Analyzer (v2.5), Meta-Contract System (v3.0), Cognitive Graph Engine (v3.1), Self-Reasoning Loop (v3.2), and the Distributed Persona Fabric (v3.3). Each phase was integrated into the orchestrator and verified via CLI commands.
output.outcome: The SSP codebase now contains the foundational layers for self-analysis, self-definition, semantic understanding, autonomous reasoning, and collective intelligence.

notes: This session marks a significant leap in the SSP's evolution, moving from a reactive system to one with the foundational components for proactive and autonomous operation. The next steps will build upon these layers to create more complex emergent behaviors.
